channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Helpful
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Helpful

item.title: CVE-2022-2834|2024-08-03T00:52:58.931Z -- unknown -- helpful
item.description: The Helpful WordPress plugin before 4.5.26 puts the exported logs and feedbacks in a publicly accessible location and guessable names, which could allow attackers to download them and retrieve sensitive information such as IP, Names and Email Address depending on the plugin's settings
